article.title: Comparisons of LC Proofslip and MARC Tape Arrival Dates at the University of Chicago Library
article.author: Payne, Charles T.McGee, Robert S.
article.text: A comparison of arrival dates of 5020 LC proofslips and corresponding MARC magnetic tape records that four-fifths of the MARC records were received the same week as, or earlier than, the proofslips..
